response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with exceptional quality. It comes equipped with cutting-edge features that promise unparalleled performance and efficiency. Considering its outstanding capabilities and the value it offers, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $12,000. This is an opportunity to secure a high-quality item at a competitive rate. I believe this investment would be well worth it for you. If you're interested, please let me know, and we can proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 12000}
